GSD.product_version: versions from v3.17 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
Bluetooth: use hdev lock for accept_list and reject_list in conn req

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 8ace1e63550a4488f3eb4ce0fea7007898908f7d, it was introduced in version v3.17 by commit a55bd29d522729e0cb125474396acdc2a107d4d9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: Bluetooth: use hdev lock for accept_list and reject_list in conn req
